amendment.description: To make available an additional $60,000,000 for operation and maintenance, Defense-wide, for certain child and family assistance benefits for members of the Armed Forces.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1515 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1515 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Dayton. (consideration: CR S12497-12513) To make available an additional $60,000,000 for operation and maintenance, Defense-wide, for certain child and family assistance benefits for members of the Armed Forces.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1515 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1515 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Dayton.
